ygData.subject: Brad on warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: This is an excerpt from a post from EQ Vauly from Brad. It has not yet been prooven do be Brads, but I have have no reason to doubt it, except for the fact
ygData.messageBody:
This is an excerpt from a post from EQ Vauly from Brad. It has not yet been
"prooven" do be Brads, but I have have no reason to doubt it, except for the
fact that it was posted very early for CA time.

Here is the excerpt:
: Certain classes (warriors) were not at all thought out.

You know, I'm going to change my position on this, after some long
discussions with the GMs, my dev team, and after careful consideration of
the various emails and posts I've read. There will be some significant
improvements made to warriors soon. But not well thought out? Hrm. As the
game progressed through beta and through release, we've been tweaking and
balancing, and sometimes classes need to be re-balanced a bit. But I think
we always make a concerted effort to think things out.

*****************************************************

Funny I remember saying I thought may have been balance early in beta and
not looked at since :)

It is in a thread called: As soon as I dump my stuff to my guildmemebers I
cancle my account (or something like that).

Enjoy the news.

Kailyn of Povar
